scripts.build:android: mkdirp dist/android && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --reset-cache --bundle-output dist/android/index.android.bundle --sourcemap-output dist/android/index.android.bundle.map
scripts.build:ios: mkdirp dist/ios && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --reset-cache --bundle-output dist/ios/main.jsbundle --sourcemap-output dist/ios/main.jsbundle.map
scripts.build:ios:dev: mkdir -p dist/ios && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --assets-dest dist/ios --entry-file index.js --reset-cache --bundle-output dist/ios/main.jsbundle --sourcemap-output dist/ios/main.jsbundle.map
scripts.build:ios:debug: xcodebuild -workspace ios/myApp.xcworkspace -scheme myApp -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath dist/ios/
scripts.sentry:upload:ios: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org $SENTRY_ORG --project $SENTRY_PROJECT dist/ios/ && sentry-cli --url $SENTRY_URL sourcemaps upload --org $SENTRY_ORG --project $SENTRY_PROJECT --release=$SENTRY_RELEASE --dist=ios dist/ios/
scripts.sentry:upload:android: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org $SENTRY_ORG --project $SENTRY_PROJECT dist/android/ && sentry-cli --url $SENTRY_URL sourcemaps upload --org $SENTRY_ORG --project $SENTRY_PROJECT --release=$SENTRY_RELEASE --dist=android dist/android/
